articles.content: Petrol, and Diesel Prices on October 18: Crude oil prices are rising in the international market. Around 6 am on Wednesday, WTI crude was being sold at $ 88.31 per barrel. At the same time, Brent cru… [+1017 chars]

articles.title: Market for Indian hydrogen equipment manufacturing and services worth $50 bn by 2030: IH2A - ETEnergyWorld
articles.description: The industry body projects $36-bn regional equipment and services exports market and $13.5-bn domestic equipment market size over next seven years
articles.content: New Delhi: Market for Indian-manufactured hydrogen equipment will be worth $45 billion to $50 billion by 2030, according to a recent report by industry body India Hydrogen Alliance (IH2A). This marke… [+2886 chars]

articles.author: PTI
articles.title: Vedanta explores tie-up with Japanese tech firms as it plans to set up chip plant - The Economic Times
articles.description: Vedanta group firm AvanStrate Inc is headquartered in Japan. Late last year, the company signed agreements with 30 Japanese technology companies to foster the development of India's semiconductor and glass display manufacturing ecosystem.
articles.content: Vedanta Group on Tuesday said it is exploring collaborations with Japanese technology companies as it continues with its plan to set up a semiconductor fab in Gujarat. Vedanta's semiconductor and dis… [+2278 chars]
